mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(eventno, e_title, e_content, e_file1, e_size1, e_thumb1, e_cnt, rdate, word, adminno, productno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(eventno), 0)+1 as eventno FROM event), #{e_title}, #{e_content}, #{e_file1}, #{e_size1}, #{e_thumb1}, #{e_cnt}, sysdate, #{word}, #{adminno}, #{productno})
mapper.select: SELECT eventno, e_title, e_content, e_file1, e_size1, e_thumb1, e_cnt, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as rdate, word, adminno, productno FROM event ORDER BY eventno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM event

SELECT COUNT(*) as n_cnt FROM event
WHERE word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
